initializePool((address,address,uint24,i.details: If the pool is already initialized, this function will not revert and just return type(int24).max

params.key: The PoolKey of the pool to initialize
params.sqrtPriceX96: The initial starting price of the pool, expressed as a sqrtPriceX96

returns._0: The current tick of the pool, or type(int24).max if the pool creation failed, or the pool already existed
